rounds.category: THE OLD TESTAMENT--BEFORE THE DELUGE

clues.text: This 969-year-old died in the year of the flood

rounds.comments: (Alex: You're gonna be dealing with two elements in each clue.  I'll give you an example.  If we said "Tender is the ____ of the Living Dead", you'd say, "What is Night?" because it completes one and works with the other also.)

rounds.text: Peter the Great designed Russia's flag based on the tricolor flag of this nation where he'd gone to learn shipbuilding
